text: The Xiaomi 14, Xiaomi 14 Pro and Xiaomi 14 Ultra are flagship Android-based smartphones developed by Xiaomi that succeeded the Xiaomi 13 Series. The Xiaomi 14 Series was launched globally at MWC 2024 in Barcelona, Spain. ==Design== The Xiaomi 14 has a flat front made of Corning Gorilla Glass Victus. The Xiaomi 14 Pro has a front with curvature side edges made of in- house Xiaomi Shield (Longjing) Glass. The Xiaomi 14 Ultra, like the Xiaomi 14 Pro, features a front made of Shield Glass. Although having curvature around the perimeter, it is less noticeable than it is on the Pro model. The back of the Xiaomi 14 is made of a silicone polymer material in the Snow Mountain Powder (pink) color option (and glass in other color options). The Xiaomi 14 Pro features a back made of glass in all color options. The Xiaomi 14 Ultra is made of glass in the Dragon Crystal Blue color (and eco-leather in other color options). The frames of Xiaomi 14, Xiaomi 14 Pro, and Xiaomi 14 Ultra are mainly made of aluminum (The Xiaomi 14 Pro and Xiaomi 14 Ultra give Titanium Special Editions with the titanium frame). The main design changes of the Xiaomi 14 looking most different from the Xiaomi 13 is the camera island, which now has no dividing lines and newly features a not the same arrangement of elements, including the three camera lenses, LED flash, and a Leica logo. The Xiaomi 14 Pro, compared to the Xiaomi 13 Pro, features a flatter back and a consistent frame width on all sides. The Xiaomi 14 Ultra looks mostly identical to its predecessor design but includes a bezel around the camera island and a bump on the upper part of the back. The Xiaomi 14, Xiaomi 14 Pro, and Xiaomi 14 Ultra have IP68 water and dust resistance. On the bottom side of the Xiaomi 14 Pro, there is a dual sim tray, a microphone, a USB Type C Port, and a speaker on the top of the device. On Xiaomi 14 Ultra there is a second speaker. On the right side, there is a volume up and down button and a power button. Additional elements including an IR port and an extra microphone have been moved to the camera island. Xiaomi 14 in global markets has a Black, White, and Jade Green color option. Xiaomi 14 in China also has a Snow Mountain Powder (pink) color, a Dragon Crystal Blue color, and a Titanium Special Edition version. The Xiaomi 14 Pro, similar to the other versions, has Black, White, Jade Green, and Titanium Special Edition color options. Xiaomi 14 Xiaomi 14 Pro Xiaomi 14 Ultra Color Name Color Name Color Name Black Black Black White White White Jade Green Jade Green Dragon Crystal Blue Snow Mountain Powder Titanium Special Edition Titanium Special Edition ==Features== ===Hardware=== ====Platform==== The Xiaomi 14, 14 Pro, and 14 Ultra have a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC platform with Adreno 750 GPU. ====Battery and Charging==== They have a non-removable Li-Po batteries with a capacity of 4610 mAh in the Xiaomi 14, 4880 mAh in the Xiaomi 14 Pro, 5000 mAh in the global Xiaomi 14 Ultra, and 5300 mAh in the Chinese Xiaomi 14 Ultra. The Xiaomi 14 and Xiaomi 14 Ultra work with 90 W fast wired charging and the Xiaomi 14 Pro works with 120 W fast wired charging. The Xiaomi 14 and Xiaomi 14 Pro work with 50 W fast wireless charging and the Xiaomi 14 Ultra works with 80 W fast wireless charging. At the time of release, Xiaomi 14 Ultra had the most powerful wireless charging since the Mi 11 Ultra. All three models have a 5W reverse wireless charging. ====Camera==== The 14 and 14 Pro have a triple camera setup of the following lenses: *50 MP wide-angle lens with an f/1.6 aperture on the base model and an adjustable aperture ranging from f/1.4 to f/4.0 on the Pro model, featuring phase detection dual pixel autofocus, laser autofocus, and optical image stabilization; *50 MP telephoto lens with an f/2.0 aperture, 3.2x optical zoom, phase detection autofocus, and optical image stabilization; *50 MP ultra wide-angle lens with an f/2.2 aperture, a 115° field of view, and autofocus on the Pro model. On the other hand, the 14 Ultra has a quad-camera setup of the following lenses *50 MP 1-inch Sony LYT-900 wide-angle lens with an adjustable aperture ranging from f/1.6 to f/4.0, multi-directional phase detection autofocus, laser autofocus, and optical image stabilization; *50 MP Sony IMX858 telephoto lens with an f/1.8 aperture, 3.2x optical zoom, phase detection dual pixel autofocus, and optical image stabilization; *50 MP Sony IMX858 periscope telephoto lens with an f/2.5 aperture, 5x optical zoom, phase detection dual pixel autofocus, and optical image stabilization; *50 MP Sony IMX858 ultrawide-angle lens with an f/1.8 aperture, a 123° field of view, and phase detection dual pixel autofocus. In addition, the 14 Ultra features a TOF 3D camera for depth measurement. All models also use LEICA SUMMILUX optics. The main cameras of the 14 and 14 Pro can record video at a maximum of 8K at 24fps, while the main camera of the 14 Ultra can record video at up to 8K at 30fps. Xiaomi 14, Xiaomi 14 Pro, and Xiaomi 14 Ultra have a 32 MP front-facing camera with an f/2.5 aperture and the ability to record video at a maximum of 4K at 60fps. ====Display==== The models have an LTPO AMOLED display with an adaptive 1–120 Hz refresh rate, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, a 20:9 aspect ratio, a centered circular cutout for the front-facing camera, and an under-display optical fingerprint sensor. The display of the Xiaomi 14 has a 6.36" diagonal, 2670 × 1200 resolution, and a 460 ppi pixel density, while the display of the Pro and Ultra have a 6.73" diagonal, 3200 × 1440 (QHD+) resolution and a 522 ppi pixel density. ====Sound==== The smartphones have a stereo speaker with Dolby Atmos technology. In the Xiaomi 14, the earpiece doubles as the second speaker, while the Pro and Ultra feature a dedicated second speaker on the top of the frame. ====Memory==== The Xiaomi 14 has 8 GB with 256GB, 12GB with 256GB, 16GB with 512 GB, or 16GB with 1TB memory, and the Xiaomi 14 Pro and Xiaomi 14 Ultra have 12GB with 256GB, 16GB with 512GB or 16GB with 1TB memory. ===Software=== Xiaomi 14 and Xiaomi 14 Pro became the first smartphones running the HyperOS operating system with Android 14. The Xiaomi 14 Ultra has the same software. The Xiaomi 14, Xiaomi 14 Pro, and Xiaomi 14 Ultra can be upgraded to other version like HyperOS 2 with Android 15. ==References== Category:Xiaomi mobile phones Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 8K video recording Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2023
